post.body: Merry Christmas from the HawkesBay Dawn. It's a beautiful day here today too, so going out in it now. Enjoy your day :-)
Welcome home!!! Give yourself a few days and it'l feel like you've never left.Hope to catch you for a wine or 2 next week. :-)
When I was little my Mum would always say 'u wait,the older u get the faster time goes by" Boy was she right r we showing our age
Gosh just watched that link, it's sad to think there are so many dishonest people out there,and so many of us suckers.
Decided 2 do 2 things 2day might even do more.Hosting done and dusted.:-) Rain has stopped or should I say spits hav stopped,hot and muggy
New Years resolution is to take ACTION everyday,even if it is something small. 1. domain name done and dusted.:-) Oh the rain has arrived
Just back from morning walk. The Bay is letting us down a bit today, still warm but clouding over and looking like rain. Sun'll be back :-)
Watchin Supersize vs Superskinny, as I'm a skinny person it's great 2 c advise 4 us skinny ones 2.Can b just as hard 2 put on as to take off
http://twitpic.com/yvv3 - One view from that cool seat
http://twitpic.com/yvue - This cool seat has amazing views over Bay View Beach. See how dry the ground is too and it's only December.
http://tinyurl.com/9h3eod Wow wish I had an uncle like Dr Harold Carr :-)
What an amazing start to 2009, yesterday 30 now today looking like even a hotter summers day here in the beautiful Hawke's Bay. :-)
Rocked the New Year in with friends,had a blast from the past today, a friend I haven't seen in years.What a great start to 2009 :-)
Signing out for 2008. Has been a great one, Happy New Year everyone.Wishing you all great success,love and laughter for 2009!!!!
MERRY CHRISTMAS AND HAPPY NEW YEAR TO YOU ALL. HAVE A FABULOUS FESTIVE SEASON!!!!!
Can any1 help. I just updated twitterfox 1.7.4 now I have no twitterfox & can't get into my addons.Any help would be appreciated.Ta
Really feeling like Rapunzel today,a Damsel locked in my own tower. Have let my hair down now just waiting for the prince :-)
http://twitpic.com/uirl - Think my cats telling me he's bored or it's time for bed. God he looks so big beside my laptop. :-)
http://tinyurl.com/5bs6hc Yes just love good old classic. Bet u sing it while listening :-)
Just loving the day, loving life, being grateful for all I have and all I have to give to others. :-)
